thread.title: Ryanair to face down pilot demands as profits rise

title: Ryanair to face down pilot demands as profits rise
text:
Ryanair to face down pilot demands as profits rise  41 
Ryanair warns it will face down ''laughable demands'' by pilots for conditions typical of high-cost rivals even if that means strike disruption, overshadowing an increase in profit for Europe's largest budget airline. Ciara Lee reports   
Ryanair warns it will face down "laughable demands" by pilots for conditions typical of high-cost rivals even if that means strike disruption, overshadowing an increase in profit for Europe's largest budget airline. Ciara Lee reports  //reut.rs/2E4viTq
